title: Wall Street Revolving Door During Financial Crisis
description: Document the systematic appointment of Wall Street executives to key regulatory positions during the 2008-2009 financial crisis. Track policy outcomes that benefited their former employers.
research_areas: What are the specific dates and actors involved in Wall Street Revolving Door During Financial Crisis?
What are the financial amounts and policy changes related to this investigation?
How does this connect to broader institutional capture patterns?
What documentation and sources verify these timeline events?
source_requirements: Government documents, financial records, policy communications
pdf_source: Institutional Patterns in the Obama Administration_ Industry Influence, Regulatory Enforcement, and Governance Challenges.pdf
